Bjarne Andersen wrote:
> Would be a nice filter to have

So there's no way to do without modifying the code, heh?

>  > Additionally, it would be useful to me to have the arcreader tool output
>  > the HTTP response along with the other metadata (length, mime, offset,
>  > etc) when running it like this:

Looking through org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader.java code, it looks like 
the HTTP response *should* be displayed by arcreader, but for some 
reason it always displays a dash (-).  I'm using the most recent version 
of ARCReader.java (1.67).  Am I doing something wrong?

Thanks,
Frank
